This episode I try my hand and sculpting a custom Cadaver Collector miniature inspired by the new Mordenkainen's Tome of Foes for Dungeons & Dragons. I use a mixutre of Wizkids and Reaper Bones minis, with random parts, Green Stuff, and Milliput to create my own unique monster mini.
